name: sticker_trending
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool giphy.
Tool description: Giphy is an animated GIF search engine.

The Giphy API implements a REST-like interface. Connections can be made with any HTTP enabled programming language. The Giphy API also implements CORS, allowing you to connect to Giphy from JavaScript / Web browsers on your own domain.
API description: Fetches the latest trending stickers from Giphy using the specified parameters.

s.description: The term or phrase to translate into a sticker.

limit.description: The number of results to return, with a maximum of 100. Defaults to 25.

fmt.description: The format in which to return results, either 'html' or 'json'.

rating.description: The content rating to limit results to, one of 'y', 'g', 'pg', 'pg-13', or 'r'.
